sentences.en: At my brother's high school graduation the students recited a poem.
sentences.cn: 在我弟弟的高中毕业典礼上，学生们朗诵了一首诗。

sentences.en: He beat up on my brother's kid one time.
sentences.cn: 他有一次殴打了我哥的孩子。

sentences.en: He paid my brother to kill Norton and keep his mouth shut.
sentences.cn: 他花钱雇我兄弟去杀了诺顿并给了他封口费。

sentences.en: He sacrificed his own career so that his avaricious brother could succeed.
sentences.cn: 他牺牲了自己的事业，这样他贪婪的弟弟才能成功。

sentences.en: He shouted at his brother, his neck veins bulging.
sentences.cn: 他朝他的兄弟吼叫，脖子上青筋暴突。

sentences.en: He's a mere slip of a lad compared to his brother.
sentences.cn: 跟他哥哥一比，他不过是个小毛孩。

sentences.en: His brother beat out the flames with a blanket.
sentences.cn: 他哥哥用毯子把火扑灭了。

sentences.en: His progress at school had been unspectacular compared to his brother.
sentences.cn: 和弟弟相比，他在学校里的进步很不起眼。

sentences.en: His sons, brother and nephews were his armed sidekicks.
sentences.cn: 他的儿子、兄弟和侄子都是他的左膀右臂，都配备了武器。

sentences.en: I have two brothers, William and Mark.
sentences.cn: 我有两个兄弟，威廉和马克。

sentences.en: My big brother (=  older brother  ) has always looked after me.
She had shared responsibility for her brother since girlhood.
sentences.cn: 她还是个小姑娘的时候就分担起照顾弟弟的责任。

sentences.en: She led a normal, happy life with her sister and brother.
sentences.cn: 她和弟弟妹妹一起过着平凡而幸福的生活。

sentences.en: Shirley's brother is now a consultant heart surgeon in Sweden.
sentences.cn: 雪利的兄弟现在在瑞典做心脏外科高级顾问医师。

sentences.en: Stephen Smith was accepted into the family like an adopted brother.
sentences.cn: 这家人把斯蒂芬·史密斯视为养子一样当作一家人。

sentences.en: The soldiers bantered with him as though he was a kid brother.
sentences.cn: 士兵们把他当作弟弟一样和他开着玩笑。
我们必须携手工作，伙计们！

sentences.en: What's she up to? She's as loony as her brother!
sentences.cn: 她打算干什么？她跟她那兄弟一样神经！
